name: Andhika Surya Syahputra- Electronic Engineering Technology Student
description: I am an Electrical Engineering student with a strong interest in electronics, programming, and control systems. I have hands-on experience through internships at PPTIK ITB and Gumaya Tower Hotel, where I developed practical skills in PCB prototyping, soldering, troubleshooting, and programming using C++ and Python. I am a fast learner, capable of working independently or in a team, and committed to contributing to innovative and efficient technological solutions.
